summary: Merchant of Ivalia, This mod adds Two Ship near The Lady Stone. It featured a Tavern , Inns , Cafe ,           Book Shop , Blacksmith's Shop , Alchemist's Shop , Spell Shop , Merchant prices are 30% better and Follower , Housecarl
descriptionHtml:
[heading][center]Merchant of Ivalia[/center][/heading]

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/47969-1-1385315516.jpg[/img]

......................................................
I am unable to read or write in english.
I am use google to translate.
.....................................................
Merchant of Ivalia, This mod adds Two Ship near The Lady Stone. It featured a Tavern , Inns , Cafe , Book Shop , Blacksmith's Shop , Alchemist's Shop , Spell Shop , Merchant prices are 30% better and Follower , Housecarl
......................................................
Not npc.
Save the game.
Out of the game.
And start the game.
.....................................................
[center]Ivalia Follower[/center]
[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/47969-1-1385404950.jpg[/img]

[center]Valentine Sister Housecarl[/center]
[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/47969-2-1385404950.jpg[/img]
.....................................................
Add your music for Merchant of Ivalia

- Choose your Music.
- Use a music converter tool to convert all your songs to .wav format.
- Rename the tracks in numerical order like this:
BGM1
BGM2
BGM3
BGM4
BGM5
BGM6
BGM7
BGM8
BGM9
BGM10
-Put your tracks in the Steam/Steamapps/common/Skyrim/Data/Magical Dreamers/MUSMerchant of Ivalia/
-Load Game up and have everything work fine.
.......................................................
[youtube]jciQnlP2TcY[/youtube]

[youtube]-vMRQIDprGo[/youtube]
........................................................
Thank you very much

Bethesda
